recipe.title: Williams Beer Bread
recipe.subtitle: Wills mad bread with beer in it
recipe.ingredients: 3 C Flour 5 tsp Baking Powder 2 Tbsp mixed herbs 1 tsp Salt 330 ml Beer
recipe.steps: Put everything in a bowl and combine. Put into loaf tin Put Grated Cheese and Pepper on top Bake for 180C for 60 mins
